results.abstract: Not only do people need to behave with integrity and benevolence, they need to develop the skills to make people feel respected and safe.
results.title: How to Build Trust: A Practical Guide

results.abstract: A fan of crime novels, the former police commissioner loves Michael Connelly’s hero Harry Bosch — but adds, “I don’t have a favorite villain.”
results.title: Bill Bratton Doesn’t Root for the Bad Guys
